alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton County through 945 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Lake Pleasant, or 17 miles southwest of Speculator, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Pleasant, Shaker Place, Powley Place, Piseco, Rudeston, Clockmill Corners, Higgins Bay and Whitehouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
